<article style=""><h1>The Building Blocks of Interpretability</h1><p>With the growing success of neural networks, there is a corresponding need to be able to explain their decisions - including building conﬁdence about how they will behave in the real-world, detecting model bias, and for scientiﬁc curiosity. In order to do so, we need to both construct deep abstractions and reify (or instantiate) them in rich interfaces .</p><img src="https://distill.pub/2018/building-blocks/thumbnail.jpg" /></article>
